org.insolina.matplotj

Class XChartSwingWrapper<T extends org.knowm.xchart.internal.chartpart.Chart>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.insolina.matplotj.XChartSwingWrapper<T>

  • public class XChartSwingWrapper<T extends org.knowm.xchart.internal.chartpart.Chart>
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience class used to display a Chart in a barebones Swing application. Nigel Currie: Version of the XChart SwingWrapper amended to centre the window
